text: BlockFi was a digital asset lender. It was founded by Zac Prince and Flori Marquez in 2017. It was based in Jersey City, New Jersey. On November 28, BlockFi confirmed the reports and officially filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection with more than 100,000 creditors, according to filings. Category:Finance Category:Jersey City, New Jersey Category:2017 establishments in the United States Category:Cryptocurrency
title: BlockFi
